idea-plugin.name: Matching Colored Brackets
idea-plugin.description:
Free and open-source colored bracket matching plugin for IntelliJ IDEA.

Features:

  • Colorizes matching brackets, parentheses, braces, and angle brackets (<>)
  • Supports unlimited nesting levels with cycling colors
  • Theme-aware colors (different colors for light and dark themes)
  • Automatic detection of bracket pairs
  • Works with all file types
  • Completely free and open-source with no premium features

This plugin helps you quickly identify matching bracket pairs by assigning different colors to each nesting level, making it easier to read and navigate complex code structures.
